en: those sp. introduced by agricultural specialists (like the turkey)
appellation of the wife’s mother by the in-laws
maize or corn stalk that didn’t produce an ear

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ gɔɔn né mèŋ ngie n gÿo lêkɔ́?
en: You tell me what should I do?

ngiemboon: À gɔ̌ɔn né mèŋ ngie: « Tóo ḿpfɛ́ɛ mmó! »
Ngie mbà loo, wóo mé gʉa lê!
en: I say that eh? Let's go!

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zɛ́te ɔ́ ngie mbɔɔn? Ńgie ɔ̀ gwǎ tó, ńgẅiin kɔ́ wɔ́?
en: I ask you that, eh? When you came, what did you have?
one of the linguistic groups of Western Region of Cameroon
piece of wood that one uses to gather
